channel.title: ~ [ Need help with currency ] ~
channel.description:
Hey, I'm testing out a PvP source, and I want to create a shop in which you buy items with your PvP points. For each kill you get, one point is added to your cumulative points. I want it so that if I have 5 points, and a santa hat costs 4 points, I can buy it and still have 1 point left.
Thanks in advance! ~Jc22493

item.title: ~ [ Need help with currency ] ~
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:5, topic:259754”][quote author=SandScape link=topic=343010.msg2650438#msg2650438 date=1233499666]

[quote author=jc22493 link=topic=343010.msg2650437#msg2650437 date=1233499604]
Get the FUCK off if you are not going to make a useful post.
[/quote] your the one flamming im helping you out by telling you to stop double posting
[/quote]well im willing to help you if yuo stop flamming at me!!!
You’re just a wannabe mod…So if you can’t help me with my SERVER problem, please refrain from posting on my thread. Thanks.

On Topic:
Does anyone know how to do this?[/quote]

Read full topic
